channel.title: Debian on francisbegyn
channel.description: Recent content in Debian on francisbegyn

item.title: Making debian packages on Arch Linux
item.description: Lately I’ve been helping with a little APT repo, and it’s been fun. The thing I struggled a bit with was making a .deb package on my system (“Hey, did you know I use Arch Linux?”). Not because this is badly documented, but a lot of the documentation is actually making use of devscripts, dh_make or other helpers, which for some unkown reason all refuse to work on my system.
